ANALYST REPORT

__Gartner Market Guide for Zero Trust Network Access 2020__ The corporate datacenter used to be the center of the universe. But today, data lives everywhere, and employees connect from dispersed locations and devices. Yesterday's controls have broken down. Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) platforms replace broken corporate perimeters with individual access boundaries around your most critical applications. To meaningfully reduce your security risks with ZTNA, you'll need to hide applications from public view and implement a mechanism to verify every request -- ideally on a highly performant, global network. Cloudflare has built that network. We're excited that Gartner has named us as a representative ZTNA-as-a-Service vendor in the *2020 Gartner Market Guide for Zero Trust Network Access.* Register to view the report now, and we believe you will learn: - How ZTNA improves security in an increasingly cloud-oriented world - Why 90% of Gartner clients are seeking ZTNA-as-a-service offerings, like Cloudflare for Teams - Questions to ask ZTNA vendors to make the right choice for your business
